name: Rebake
description:
In this game you can control an army of rolls, fight other armies of rolls and take control of them by "Rebaking" them.

Rolls are funny creatures, resembling a human head entombed into a chocolate swiss roll. There are multiple types of them, each having own purpose. There are overall 3 types of rolls in this game:

1. Basic - They do simple function, get close to enemy rolls and bite them to death. They have basic hp and damage

2. Armored - They are much more tankier than your average rolls, being able to take many hits and still punch back. They are largely on the front of the army.

3. Tank - They have normal HP and a ranged attack, usually helpful against surrounded enemies or taking care of the enemies from the distance.

There is also another Roll type I haven't mentioned, but that's because there isn't much known about it. Little whom have seen it, and those that did barely managed to escape. Only myths are known about an unwinnable foe, towering meters above anything else. Legends say it cannot be defeated, and those that dare to challenge it will be put to death swiftly. If you see it, you are as good as dead.

Controls:

Left click to select unit, dragging with left click does box select

Right click to move units (they attack automatically)

WASD to move camera (Or move mouse to edge of screen)

E to select all units

R to Rebake nearby dead units

Game is created by DeanConnor#6418, I am simply publishing it under his request.

Changelog:

Rebake 1.1 

- Fixed minor bugs

- Fixed credits

- Added an ending
